Hmm . . I'm looking for a . .  guinea pi . . . beta tester for a
program  I've written that functions similiarly to "Boost".  I call
the program "Trickster's Boost", for reasons that will become . .
obvious to any users of said program.  It assumes you are using a
saved game file from the registered version.  

It should run under Windows and on my home pc, it 'behaves'
appropriately.  I used VB's "Make exe" command and I am wanting to see
if any additional files are needed for it to run properly.

And yes, I know how to detect if my program is used any gladiator
tournament.

If anybody will email me privately, I'll send you the file.  If the
program doesn't run, I need to know which files it said it was missing.

* * * 

Ok, what specifically can the program do?

Let's see . . 

1)Reset scenario status so you can play the same scenario repeatedly
after obtaining victory each time

2)Reset the amount of cash to give you the maximum amount of cash

3)Boost character stats up to what I believe are the best possible.
(we're talking about an experience level 500 character and mana
recharges completely immediately after using most attacks unless time
is frozen, the strongest possible attacks of any character, fastest
possible speed for any character - ie. if this character can't defeat
the scenario, then it's impossible for any hired character of that
type to defeat said scenario)
